targets.rawSql:
SELECT  transaction_code as "ID Tracciamento File",file_name as "Nome del File", MAX(creation_date) as "Data Creazione File", count(*) as "Numero righe file"
        ,sum(case when processing_step3 > 1 then 1 when processing_step2 > 1 then 1 when processing_step1 > 1 then 1 else 0 end) as "Record Errore"
        ,case when sum(case when processing_step3<=1 then 0 else 1 end) = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora errori file"
FROM TIN_DATA_THIRD_PARTY_IN tdtpi
  --WHERE creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
  WHERE creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
AND source_type_pc = 20
and ('${TipoFile}'= '0' or '${TipoFile}'= '2')
GROUP BY transaction_code,file_name
UNION 
SELECT transaction_code as "ID Tracciamento File",file_name as "Nome del File", MAX(creation_date) as "Data Creazione File", count(*) as "Numero righe file"
        ,sum(case when processing_step3 > 1 then 1 
                  when processing_step2 > 1 then 1 
                  when processing_step1 > 1 then 1 
                  when processing_item = 2 then 1 
                  when processing_sale_code = 2 then 1 
                  when processing_assortment = 2 then 1  
                  when processing_puchase_price = 2 then 1
                  when processing_sale_price = 2 then 1
                  when processing_feature = 2 then 1
                  else 0 end) as "Record Errore"
        ,case when sum(case when processing_item = 2 or processing_sale_code = 2 or processing_assortment = 2 or processing_puchase_price = 2 or processing_sale_price = 2 or processing_feature = 2 then 1
                            when processing_step3<=1 then 0 
                            else 1 end) = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora errori file"
FROM TIN_DATA_ITEM_IN tdii
  --WHERE creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
  WHERE creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
AND NETWORK='$network'
and ('${TipoFile}'= '0' or '${TipoFile}'= '1')
GROUP BY transaction_code,file_name
UNION 
SELECT transaction_code as "ID Tracciamento File",file_name as "Nome del File", MAX(creation_date) as "Data Creazione File", count(*) as "Numero righe file"
        ,sum(case when processing_step2 > 1 then 1 when processing_step1 > 1 then 1 else 0 end) as "Record Errore"
        ,case when sum(case when processing_step2<=1 then 0 else 1 end) = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora errori file"
FROM tin_data_promotion_in tdii
  --WHERE creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
  WHERE creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
AND NETWORK='$network'
and ('${TipoFile}'= '0' or '${TipoFile}'= '3')
GROUP BY transaction_code,file_name
UNION 
SELECT transaction_code as "ID Tracciamento File",file_name as "Nome del File", MAX(creation_date) as "Data Creazione File", count(*) as "Numero righe file"
        ,sum(case when processing_step3 > 1 AND processing_step3 != 9 then 1 when processing_step2 > 1 then 1 when processing_step1 > 1 then 1 else 0 end) as "Record Errore"
        ,case when sum(case when processing_step3<=1 then 0 else 1 end) = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora errori file"
FROM tin_data_kit_in tdii
  --WHERE creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
  WHERE creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
and ('${TipoFile}'= '0' or '${TipoFile}'= '4')
GROUP BY transaction_code,file_name
UNION 
SELECT transaction_code as "ID Tracciamento File",file_name as "Nome del File", MAX(creation_date) as "Data Creazione File", count(*) as "Numero righe file"
        ,sum(case when processing_step3 > 1 AND processing_step3 != 9 then 1 when processing_step2 > 1 then 1 when processing_step1 > 1 then 1 else 0 end) as "Record Errore"
        ,case when sum(case when processing_step3<=1 then 0 else 1 end) = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora errori file"
FROM tin_data_reception_in tdii
  --WHERE creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
  WHERE creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
AND NETWORK='$network'
and ('${TipoFile}'= '0' or '${TipoFile}'= '5')
GROUP BY transaction_code,file_name
order by 1

SELECT format('Fornitore "%s" : "%s"',third_party, error_message) as "Errori", file_name as "Nome del File", number_line as "Riga File", update_date as "Data Ultima Elaborazione", creation_date as "Data Creazione File"
        ,case when processing_step1 = 0 then '[ ]' when processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 0 then '[ ]' when processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1 and processing_step3 = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora record"
FROM TIN_DATA_THIRD_PARTY_IN tdtpi
WHERE (processing_step1 > 1 or processing_step2 > 1 or processing_step3 > 1)
--AND creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
AND creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
and file_name = '${selection}'
UNION 
--
SELECT format('Articolo "%s" : "%s"',item, error_message) as "Errori", file_name as "Nome del File", number_line as "Riga File", update_date as "Data Ultima Elaborazione", creation_date as "Data Creazione File"
        ,case when processing_step1 = 0 then '[ ]' when processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 0 then '[ ]' when processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1 and processing_step3 = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora record"
FROM TIN_DATA_ITEM_IN tdii
WHERE (processing_step1 > 1 or processing_step2 > 1 or processing_step3 > 1 or processing_item = 2  or processing_sale_code = 2 or processing_assortment = 2 or processing_puchase_price = 2 or processing_sale_price = 2 or processing_feature = 2)
--AND creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
AND creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
and file_name = '${selection}'
AND NETWORK='$network'
UNION 
--
SELECT format('KIT "%s" : "%s"',item, error_message) as "Errori", file_name as "Nome del File", number_line as "Riga File", update_date as "Data Ultima Elaborazione", creation_date as "Data Creazione File"
        ,case when processing_step1 = 0 then '[ ]' when processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 0 then '[ ]' when processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 1 and processing_step3 = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora record"
FROM tin_data_kit_in tdii
WHERE (processing_step1 > 1 or processing_step2 > 1 or processing_step3 > 1)
--AND creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
AND creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
and file_name = '${selection}'
UNION 
--
SELECT format('Promo-Articolo "%s" : "%s"',trim(promo_code||'-'||item), error_message) as "Errori", file_name as "Nome del File", number_line as "Riga File", update_date as "Data Ultima Elaborazione", creation_date as "Data Creazione File"
        ,case when processing_step1 = 0 then '[ ]' when processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora record"
FROM tin_data_promotion_in tdii
WHERE (processing_step1 > 1 or processing_step2 > 1 )
--AND creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
AND creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
and file_name = '${selection}'
AND NETWORK='$network'
UNION
--
SELECT error_message as "Errori", file_name as "Nome del File", number_line as "Riga File", update_date as "Data Ultima Elaborazione", creation_date as "Data Creazione File"
        ,case when processing_step1 = 0 then '[ ]' when processing_step1 = 1 and processing_step2 = 0 then '[ ]' else '[X]' end as "Rielabora record"
FROM tin_data_reception_in tdii
WHERE (processing_step1 > 1 or processing_step2 > 1 or processing_step3 > 1 )
AND processing_step3 != 9
--AND creation_date between '${__from:date::timestamp without time zone}' and '${__to:date::timestamp without time zone}'
AND creation_date between $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
and file_name = '${selection}'
AND NETWORK='$network'
order by 2

list.definition: SELECT NETWORK_CODE||' ;'||NETWORK_CODE||' - '||DESCRIPTION FROM TMD_NETWORKS WHERE network_node_type_pc = 4
list.label: sito/rete
list.name: network
list.query: SELECT NETWORK_CODE||' ;'||NETWORK_CODE||' - '||DESCRIPTION FROM TMD_NETWORKS WHERE network_node_type_pc = 4

list.definition: select id from tmd_networks where network_code='${network}'
list.name: network_id
list.query: select id from tmd_networks where network_code='${network}'

list.definition: SELECT str_val_3 from vpa_parameters where parameter_header=93 and str_val_1='QUADRATURE'
list.name: UPDATE
list.query: SELECT str_val_3 from vpa_parameters where parameter_header=93 and str_val_1='QUADRATURE'
